mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DETAIL_BOARD(DETAIL_BOARD_NO,REF_UNO, CONTENT, STATUS, DEL_STATUS, SELL_NO) VALUES(DETAIL_BOARD_NO, #{refUno}, #{content}, 'Y', 'N', #{refSno})
mapper.select: SELECT B.*, M.USER_NAME FROM DETAIL_BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(USER_NO = REF_UNO) WHERE SELL_NO = #{refSno} AND B.STATUS='Y'
